description:
Privacy focused messenger that doesn't trust anyone with your identity, your contact list, or your communications.


- fixed an error on startup under wayland on GNOME 40 (see issue #18)
- added a restart prompt to the theme selection (see issue #23)
- added option to restore backups on android (see issue #16)
- made application font size adjustable in settings
- multi identity support on android and macOS
- reduced application size (~30MB)
- added release for each android architecture (+universal)
